entry.em: ..EXTREME HEAT WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT WEDNESDAY

entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH THIS EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 108 IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE UPPER 70S IN THE AFTERNOON
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
